case.title: Poppadom Express TONIGHT ...must be attractive!!!! - 34
case.text:
Professional lady looking to wine & dine an attractive and interesting fella preferably with Asian look - ideally not religious!! Someone who is honest, confident, cheeky & has a fun side!! Must like curves!!
I'm very chilled (and genuine) so please get in touch with photo & number and lets get the party started :)
Im free this evening and can accommodate Xx
